name: Falafel Wrap
description: Popular Middle Eastern vegan delight. Crispy falafel with fresh vegetables in lavash wrap.

instructions.instruction: Drain soaked chickpeas thoroughly and pat dry.
instructions.tip: Never use canned chickpeas - falafel will fall apart.

instructions.instruction: Process chickpeas, onion, garlic, parsley and cilantro in food processor until coarsely ground.
Add spices, salt and baking soda. Mix well.
Form walnut-sized portions into flat discs.
Fry falafel 3-4 minutes per side until golden brown.
Warm lavash, spread hummus, add falafel, vegetables and tahini sauce. Wrap and serve.

tips: Dried chickpeas are essential - canned won't hold shape.
Air fry at 180°C for 15 minutes as healthier option.
Add 1 tbsp flour if mixture is too wet.
Falafel should have plenty of herbs - adds color and flavor.
storageInfo: Raw mixture keeps 3 days, cooked falafel 4 days refrigerated.
servingSuggestion: Serve with hummus, tahini sauce, pickles and tabbouleh.
variations: Use fava beans for Egyptian-style ta'amiya.
Bake at 200°C for 25 minutes instead of frying.
